importance-site-web-2025.title: Why Your Business Needs a Website in 2025
importance-site-web-2025.description: Discover why having a website is essential for your business in 2025 and how it can transform your digital presence, plus practical ways to get started.

vibe-coding.title: Vibe Coding: The Future of AI-Powered Development
vibe-coding.description: Discover vibe coding, a revolutionary software development approach that uses large language models to generate code from natural language descriptions.

technological-new-deal.title: Senegal's Technological New Deal: A Digital Revolution for Africa
technological-new-deal.description: Discover Senegal's ambitious digital strategy launched by President Bassirou Diomaye Faye to transform the country into a digital leader in Africa by 2050.

entrepreneur-tools.title: Essential Tools Every Entrepreneur Needs in 2025
entrepreneur-tools.description: Discover the game-changing tools that can transform your productivity and accelerate your business growth, from AI assistants to payment solutions.
